title: Roundup: Shiny, stealthy new bits by Fix Mfg, Chrome, Abus, Hiplock & Endura
content:
Fix Manufacturing is trying to make tire inflation and tire repair easier than ever, though not everything shown above is available quite yet. Shown splayed open is the MTB Field Kit that debuted in March 2021, giving you a complete repair, cleaning, and inflation solution in a compact zipper case. To its left is a

The post Roundup: Shiny, stealthy new bits by Fix Mfg, Chrome, Abus, Hiplock & Endura appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
